rows.label: qst102109_msg0001
rows.name:
It's only in the midst of battle that
you really learn where people's
true allegiances lie.

rows.label: qst102109_msg0002
rows.name:
Things aren't going the way I foresaw...
Still, I'm counting on you.

rows.label: qst102109_msg0101
rows.name:
Spike Urchon have been known
to attack the village before...

rows.label: qst102109_msg0102
rows.name:
They probably know how good
human food tastes.

rows.label: qst102109_msg0103
rows.name:
Defeat them all before they can
get inside!

rows.label: qst102109_msg0202
rows.name:
Disappearing at a time like this?
Suspicious...
